Find Biographical Information for MLB Players

Source: R/mlb_people.R
mlb_people.Rd

Find Biographical Information for MLB Players

Usage

mlb_people(person_ids = NULL)

Arguments

person_ids

MLBAMIDs for players of interest. Multiple IDs should be provided in a vector separated by a comma.

Value

Returns a data frame with the following columns:

col_nametypes
idinteger
full_namecharacter
linkcharacter
first_namecharacter
last_namecharacter
primary_numbercharacter
birth_datecharacter
current_ageinteger
birth_citycharacter
birth_state_provincecharacter
birth_countrycharacter
heightcharacter
weightinteger
activelogical
use_namecharacter
middle_namecharacter
boxscore_namecharacter
nick_namecharacter
gendercharacter
is_playerlogical
is_verifiedlogical
draft_yearinteger
mlb_debut_datecharacter
name_first_lastcharacter
name_slugcharacter
first_last_namecharacter
last_first_namecharacter
last_init_namecharacter
init_last_namecharacter
full_fml_namecharacter
full_lfm_namecharacter
strike_zone_topnumeric
strike_zone_bottomnumeric
pronunciationcharacter
primary_position_codecharacter
primary_position_namecharacter
primary_position_typecharacter
primary_position_abbreviationcharacter
bat_side_codecharacter
bat_side_descriptioncharacter
pitch_hand_codecharacter
pitch_hand_descriptioncharacter

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(mlb_people(person_ids = 502671))
#>       id        full_name                  link first_name   last_name
#> 1 502671 Paul Goldschmidt /api/v1/people/502671       Paul Goldschmidt
#>   primary_number birth_date current_age birth_city birth_state_province
#> 1             46 1987-09-10          34 Wilmington                   DE
#>   birth_country height weight active use_name middle_name boxscore_name
#> 1           USA  6' 3"    220   TRUE     Paul      Edward   Goldschmidt
#>   nick_name gender is_player is_verified draft_year mlb_debut_date
#> 1     Goldy      M      TRUE        TRUE       2009     2011-08-01
#>    name_first_last               name_slug  first_last_name
#> 1 Paul Goldschmidt paul-goldschmidt-502671 Paul Goldschmidt
#>     last_first_name last_init_name init_last_name
#> 1 Goldschmidt, Paul Goldschmidt, P  P Goldschmidt
#>             full_fml_name            full_lfm_name strike_zone_top
#> 1 Paul Edward Goldschmidt Goldschmidt, Paul Edward            3.49
#>   strike_zone_bottom primary_position_code primary_position_name
#> 1              1.601                     3            First Base
#>   primary_position_type primary_position_abbreviation bat_side_code
#> 1             Infielder                            1B             R
#>   bat_side_description pitch_hand_code pitch_hand_description
#> 1                Right               R                  Right
  try(mlb_people(person_ids = c(502671,605151)))
#>       id        full_name                  link first_name   last_name
#> 1 502671 Paul Goldschmidt /api/v1/people/502671       Paul Goldschmidt
#> 2 605151   Archie Bradley /api/v1/people/605151     Archie     Bradley
#>   primary_number birth_date current_age birth_city birth_state_province
#> 1             46 1987-09-10          34 Wilmington                   DE
#> 2             23 1992-08-10          29   Muskogee                   OK
#>   birth_country height weight active use_name middle_name boxscore_name
#> 1           USA  6' 3"    220   TRUE     Paul      Edward   Goldschmidt
#> 2           USA  6' 4"    215   TRUE   Archie          N.    Bradley, A
#>       nick_name gender is_player is_verified draft_year mlb_debut_date
#> 1         Goldy      M      TRUE        TRUE       2009     2011-08-01
#> 2 Crash Landing      M      TRUE        TRUE       2011     2015-04-11
#>    name_first_last               name_slug  first_last_name
#> 1 Paul Goldschmidt paul-goldschmidt-502671 Paul Goldschmidt
#> 2   Archie Bradley   archie-bradley-605151   Archie Bradley
#>     last_first_name last_init_name init_last_name
#> 1 Goldschmidt, Paul Goldschmidt, P  P Goldschmidt
#> 2   Bradley, Archie     Bradley, A      A Bradley
#>             full_fml_name            full_lfm_name strike_zone_top
#> 1 Paul Edward Goldschmidt Goldschmidt, Paul Edward           3.490
#> 2       Archie N. Bradley       Bradley, Archie N.           3.549
#>   strike_zone_bottom pronunciation primary_position_code
#> 1              1.601          <NA>                     3
#> 2              1.627      BRAD-lee                     1
#>   primary_position_name primary_position_type
#> 1            First Base             Infielder
#> 2               Pitcher               Pitcher
#>   primary_position_abbreviation bat_side_code bat_side_description
#> 1                            1B             R                Right
#> 2                             P             R                Right
#>   pitch_hand_code pitch_hand_description
#> 1               R                  Right
#> 2               R                  Right
# }
